name: Walnut Meatballs
description: Meatballs aren’t just for pasta! Serve alongside Dillicious Tzatziki for a crowd-pleasing appetizer, in a pita pocket, on a bun, or dished over brown rice. The best part? These meatballs are harbouring a superfood—walnuts are a great source of omega-3's, polyphenols (an anti-oxidant), and Vitamin E, which are all important for a healthy heart!

ingredients.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning or SPG Seasoning

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Mix all ingredients in mixing bowl.
Form into 24 small meatballs. Place on pan. Bake in oven until browned, about 15 minutes.
tips: *Swap in Lemon Dilly Dip Mix as the main seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve in a pita with 1 cup leafy greens, 1⁄2 cup chopped veggies, and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: SPG Seasoning
summary: Salt. Pepper. Garlic. Your go-to for chicken, fish, seafood, roasted potatoes, veggies, & even popcorn!
